title: NERF ZYRA
body: Nerf her Dorito Games, she is unbalanced in every way possible. Take responsibility or your game and fix what was clearly a mistake, the Zyra rework.

replies.body: Do they not? i thought they did, do heimer turret apply red buff? because its either auto absed (red buff) or spell based (rylais). thats why the whole "ai units only slow by 20%" on ryalis is on the item

Her damage always seems a little high, and I am still unsure why her plants apply Rylai's  and Liandry's, when no other AI unit does...

That being said, if you catch her out she usually dies quickly.

> [{quoted}](name=Its Not Shacko,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=goEIJsHL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-27T01:37:15.781+0000)
>
> Her damage always seems a little high, and I am still unsure why her plants apply Rylai's  and Liandry's, when no other AI unit does...
> 
> That being said, if you catch her out she usually dies quickly.

Tibber applies rylais, daisy applies rylais, pretty sure malz creeps apply rylais, tshaoc boxz applies rylais and liandry's to my knowledge. pretty sure most ap ai units apply the magic damage on hit effects.

> [{quoted}](name=dragon poo,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=goEIJsHL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-27T09:27:47.368+0000)
>
> Tibber applies rylais, daisy applies rylais, pretty sure malz creeps apply rylais, tshaoc boxz applies rylais and liandry's to my knowledge. pretty sure most ap ai units apply the magic damage on hit effects.

Shaco boxes certainly do not apply Liandrys, nor does Heimer.
